## `UseRealTimeUpdate`

Toggles whether documents are being re-analyzed as they change\index{real-time updating}.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
UseRealTimeUpdate(boolean use)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` use | `true` to enable real-time updating. |
:::
